en.about.title: About CodeVantis
en.about.me: I'm Julian, a 23-year-old dual student of business informatics from Germany and a passionate developer. As a fullstack developer, I work professionally on various projects, with different frameworks, libraries and programming languages, but in my free time I develop my own games and programs with Java.
en.about.target: My goal with CodeVantis is to share my enjoyment of programming, my progress and my projects with you. That's why I make all my programs and games available for free download on this website. Here you can find out everything about completed, current and future projects.
en.about.socialMedia: I give exclusive insights into the development of my projects on Instagram and YouTube. Take a look and stay up to date!
